content: hidde� treasure� gnom� this is an original pattern by hooks&loops please do not copy distribute or resell this pattern as your own you are most welcome to sell your finished items please tag me in your makes - i love to see them across social media as @hooksloopsbyjessica materials - worsted weight yarn in colors of choice - size 3 5 mm hook - polyfil stuffing - yarn needle - scissors - optional stitch markers stitch abbreviations - magic_ring = magic_ring - r = round i e r2 is round 2 - single_crochet = single_crochet - increase = increase - flo = front loop only - decrease = invisible decrease - blo = back loop only notes - pattern is written in us terms - work in continuous rounds do not slip_stitch to join - stitch counts are at the end of each round in parentheses - gauge is not important but if your gauge matches mine gnome will measure approximately 7 inches tall with hat on - modifications for other yarn types are at the end of the pattern along with example in ends 42 shape hat by squishing between your hands and then lightly pulling the top back up for the beard cut 20 pieces of yarn at 6 inches each pick up two pieces at a time and fold them in half putting your hook through the exposed back loops of r27 pull through each group of yarn pieces with the loop formed by folding pull the yarn ends through with your hook to create a slip knot and pull down on the ends to tighten the knot unravel the yarn using a yarn needle to achieve a curly look and trim ends into a rounded beard shape nose begin with magic_ring r1 single_crochet 6 into
